Room.Name: Mountain Trail to the Palace
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the winding trail up the strange mountain towards the Palace.
Room.LongDescription: The trail up the mountain is not quite as treacherous as you had first imagined. Nonetheless, danger lurks everywhere. As you head further south, you can start to make out the features of the large palace sitting on top the mountain. The Palace appears to be magically kept in place since it would otherwise collapse and fall down the mountain.
